title: [BuildCkeck] No warning or error message visible when replaying binlog of an analyzed build
body:
### Issue Description

When replaying binary log of analyzed build the warning or error messages are not visible


### Steps to Reproduce

1. msbuild {project} -analyze -bl 
2. msbuild {.binlog}

### Expected Behavior

the messages should be visible

### Actual Behavior

![Screenshot 2024-06-19 142808](https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/assets/114938397/ccdd26be-1a6c-4581-a613-5eccd2ee7ab2)


### Analysis

_No response_

### Versions & Configurations

_No response_
